name: Ace Zombie Killer
description:
Evil soldiers have stolen Vinny the Vikings Crystal Skull and have turned into zombies!

Become the legend of Vinny the Viking to retake the ancient Crystal Skull and defeat the evil zombie overlord who took it!

-------
Features:
-------

Shoot and slash your way through the zombie hordes, hiding in the shadows when needed.

Wield over 20 different weapons in the battle against the zombies including throwing axes, machine guns, rocket launchers and secret experimental weapons!

Chase the zombies in over 6 different areas including snow lands, cities, bunkers and even on flying planes!

Take part in exciting scenarios that see Vinny the Viking snowboarding, parachuting and jet-packing across the skies of Berlin!

Test your skill against massive boss fights!
